name: Spring Rabbit
description:
This demo was built within 24 hours as a personal challenge, trying to recreate a Ludum Dare / Game Jam experience!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Bunny here needs your help

Bunny looks forward to Spring every year, but this year, Spring never came. Jump through seasons and solve puzzles to find back the Spring that is lost.

Inspired by the Color Switch mechanic you have exactly 10 steps to press (Spacebar) to go back to the season you where in before. eg., Im in Autumn, and I run through a pile of snow to go to winter, you will have 10 steps before automatically staying in the Winter Season, on the other hand, if you press (Spacebar) before making 10 steps, you can force the season to switch  back to Autumn!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

*This is a demo, we are planning on building this into a full game with more complex mechanics, more detailed levels and more fun!
